item.title: Live Updates: Trump Drops Tariff Threat Over Greenland After Assailing Europe
U.S. Starts Moving ISIS Detainees From Syria to Iraq
item.description: The U.S. military said it had transferred 150 Islamic State detainees from northeastern Syria to Iraq and could eventually move as many as 7,000, as t...

item.title: Trump’s Moves on Greenland
item.description: After assailing Europe in a long speech at Davos, the president said he had won an agreement on the future of the Arctic territory.

item.title: Iran’s Protests Have Been Completely Squashed, Government Says
item.description: After a crackdown that killed thousands, Iran’s prosecutor general said on Wednesday that “the sedition is over now,” vowing to punish those responsib...

item.title: Majority of Latin Americans Endorsed Trump’s Intervention In Venezuela, Polls Show
item.description: A majority of those surveyed said they support the intervention, suggesting a shift from ideology to pragmatism, at least for now.
